segments.text: Can I talk to you for a moment , manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've worked here for two years . And I want to do something different .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by something different ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to live abroad and learn to speak a different language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really sorry . But I understand .
segments.speaker: S2
